value.fullName: Approaches work and solves problems by continually looking for new or better ways to accomplish tasks, effectively balancing risks and rewards and constantly striving for operational excellence.
value.label: Approaches work and solves problems by continually looking for new or better ways to accomplish tasks, effectively balancing risks and rewards and constantly striving for operational excellence.

value.fullName: Anticipate recognize and act on opportunities for positive results or changes
value.label: Anticipate recognize and act on opportunities for positive results or changes

value.fullName: Initiate change & innovation • Continually question and challenge to improve our products, services and ways of working
value.label: Initiate change & innovation • Continually question and challenge to improve our products, services and ways of working

value.fullName: Seek to push standards and raise the bars for better performance every time
value.label: Seek to push standards and raise the bars for better performance every time

value.fullName: Embrace change and take reasonable risks; learn from both successes and failures.
value.label: Embrace change and take reasonable risks; learn from both successes and failures.

value.fullName: Discover new possibilities and challenge the status quo
value.label: Discover new possibilities and challenge the status quo

value.fullName: Take ownership & be accountable • Aim to do the right things and make informed decisions to benefit short-term and long-term goals
value.label: Take ownership & be accountable • Aim to do the right things and make informed decisions to benefit short-term and long-term goals

value.fullName: Hold self and team accountable to meet customer and business goals and be committed to stay the course from start to finish to deliver desired outcomes
value.label: Hold self and team accountable to meet customer and business goals and be committed to stay the course from start to finish to deliver desired outcomes

value.fullName: Be proactive and leverage on opportunities to grow and learn
value.label: Be proactive and leverage on opportunities to grow and learn
